Plot: A comedy about a young lawyer of a prestigious firm but with a catastrophic private life.
Title: Studio illegale
Writer: Federico Baccomo (novel), Federico Baccomo (screenplay), Francesco Bruni (screenplay), Umberto Riccioni Carteni (screenplay), Alfredo Covelli (screenplay)
Actors: Fabio Volo, Zoé Félix, Ennio Fantastichini, Nicola Nocella
